# Create indicator

Stata code:
```{r}
# STATA chunk of code
# gen sba=0
# replace sba=1 if m3a==1 | m3b==1 | m3c==1
```

R code:
```{r}
# data$sba = 0
# data$sba[data$m3a==1 | data$m3b==1 | data$m3c==1] = 1
# data$sba[data$m3a==9] = 0
```
